channel.title: Comments for LabFiles at LightningRod Labs
channel.description: Seat of the pants engineering on a shoe-string budget

item.title: Comment on greetings from Rod by jeremy
item.dc:creator: jeremy
item.description: You never told me about the generator radio! In fact, I'm not sure which of the bedrooms was yours in high school. Does the anchor tree still stand?
item.content:encoded: You never told me about the generator radio! In fact, I’m not sure which of the bedrooms was yours in high school. Does the anchor tree still stand?

item.title: Comment on Sharpening a Reel Mower by LabFiles at LightningRod Labs » Blog Archive » Sharpening a Reel Mower
item.dc:creator: LabFiles at LightningRod Labs » Blog Archive » Sharpening a Reel Mower
item.description: [...] Okay, maybe we drink beer while we’re doing it, too. Regardless of that, for 2008, we decided to document the easy way to sharpen a reel mower — potentially saving you $60+ over a professional sharpening, while still making the mower every bit as sharp. Click here for more. [...]
